Literature.Title: Identification of a Novel Cathelicidin from the Deinagkistrodon acutus Genome with Antibacterial Activity by Multiple Mechanisms.
Literature.Author: Zhong L, Liu J, Teng S, Xie Z

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=<50 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:11% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:17% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli BL21(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=3.12µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=3.12µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MBC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas donghuensis HYS(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas donghuensis HYS(MBC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=6.25-12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MBC=12.5-25µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=25µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(MFC=50µg/ml)
